text: Hai ureueng mukmin bek roh tatanyong Nyang han meukeunong watee geupeugah Meunyo geupeugah peue nyang tatanyong Gata jeut bingong meutamah susah Watee geupeutron ayat Qur'an Meunyo watee nayn tatanyong bagah Nyan cit geujaweub peue nyang tatanyong Nyoe teuma Tuhan ka Neupeumeuâ€˜ah Tuhan Pengampon lom pih halim that Beu salah that-that pih Neupeumeuâ€˜ah
